languages.text: "Я знала, что мон-кай не поверят мне, расскажи я о предательстве их верного шпиона за чужаками. Они бы оборвали мой Путь. Мою жизнь. И дети Крудараха никогда не узнали бы правды. Но... поверил{mf||а} бы мне элантах?.."

"I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"
languages.original_text: "Я знала, что мон-кай не поверят мне, расскажи я о предательстве их верного шпиона за чужаками. Они бы оборвали мой Путь. Мою жизнь. И дети Крудараха никогда не узнали бы правды. Но... поверил{mf||а} бы мне элантах?.."

traits.locale_text: "I knew the mon-keigh wouldn't have believed me if I had told them about the betrayal of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

"I knew the mon-keigh wouldn't have believed me if I had told them about the betrayal of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

"I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

"I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

"I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

languages.text: “猴子的线人本该忠实地警戒着入侵者。我明白，就算我把他背叛的事情说了出来，别的猴子也绝不会相信我，他们只会结束我的道途，我的人生。这样一来，克鲁达拉赫的子嗣永远都无法得知真相。可……如果换做是外界人的话，当初{mf|他|她}会相信我吗？”
languages.original_text: "I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

traits.locale_text: “猴子的线人本该忠实地警戒着入侵者。我明白，就算我把他背叛的事情说了出来，别的猴子也绝不会相信我，他们只会结束我的道途，我的人生。这样一来，克鲁达拉赫的子嗣永远都无法得知真相。可……如果换做是外界人的话，当初{mf|他|她}会相信我吗？”

languages.text: 「彼らの忠実な部外者の監視者の裏切りを伝えたところで、モン＝ケイは我のことを信じなかったはずだ。彼らは我の道を終わらせていただろう。我の生を。クルダラの御子は永遠に真実を知ることはなかっただろう…だが、エランタは我を信じただろうか？」
languages.original_text: "I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの忠実な部外者の監視者の裏切りを伝えたところで、モン＝ケイは我のことを信じなかったはずだ。彼らは我の道を終わらせていただろう。我の生を。クルダラの御子は永遠に真実を知ることはなかっただろう…だが、エランタは我を信じただろうか？」

languages.text: « Je savais que les mon-keigh ne m'auraient pas crue si je leur avais parlé de la trahison de leur loyal guetteur chargé de repérer les étrangers. Ils m'auraient empêchée de poursuivre ma voie. Ils auraient mis un terme à ma vie. Et les enfants de Crudarach n'auraient jamais appris la vérité. Mais... l'elantach m'aurait-{mf|il|elle} crue ? »
languages.original_text: "I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que les mon-keigh ne m'auraient pas crue si je leur avais parlé de la trahison de leur loyal guetteur chargé de repérer les étrangers. Ils m'auraient empêchée de poursuivre ma voie. Ils auraient mis un terme à ma vie. Et les enfants de Crudarach n'auraient jamais appris la vérité. Mais... l'elantach m'aurait-{mf|il|elle} crue ? »

languages.text: «Sé que los mon-keigh no me habrían creído si les hubiera hablado de la traición cometida por quien los protegía de los extranjeros. Habrían terminado mi Camino, mi vida. Y los hijos de Crudarach nunca habrían descubierto la verdad. Pero... ¿habrían creído los elantach en mí?».
languages.original_text: "I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

traits.locale_text: «Sé que los mon-keigh no me habrían creído si les hubiera hablado de la traición cometida por quien los protegía de los extranjeros. Habrían terminado mi Camino, mi vida. Y los hijos de Crudarach nunca habrían descubierto la verdad. Pero... ¿habrían creído los elantach en mí?».

languages.text: "Ich wusste, der Chem-Pan-Sey hätte mir nicht geglaubt, wenn ich den Verrat seines treuen Beobachters erwähnt hätte. Das wäre das Ende meines Weges gewesen. Meines Lebens. Und die Kinder von Crudarach hätten niemals die Wahrheit erfahren. Aber ... hätte {mf|der|die} Elantach mir geglaubt?"
languages.original_text: "I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, der Chem-Pan-Sey hätte mir nicht geglaubt, wenn ich den Verrat seines treuen Beobachters erwähnt hätte. Das wäre das Ende meines Weges gewesen. Meines Lebens. Und die Kinder von Crudarach hätten niemals die Wahrheit erfahren." Aber ... hätte {mf|der|die} Elantach mir geglaubt?"

languages.text: "Mon-keighlere sadık yabancı bekçilerinin hainliğini anlatsam bana inanmayacaklarını biliyordum. Yolumu ve hayatımı bitirirlerdi. Crudarach'ın çocukları da asla gerçeği öğrenemezdi. Peki ya elantach bana inanır mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "I knew the mon-keigh would not have believed me if I had told them about the treachery of their loyal watcher of outsiders. They would have ended my Path. My life. And the children of Crudarach would never have learned the truth. But... would the elantach have believed me?"

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighlere sadık yabancı bekçilerinin hainliğini anlatsam bana inanmayacaklarını biliyordum. Yolumu ve hayatımı bitirirlerdi. Crudarach'ın çocukları da asla gerçeği öğrenemezdi. Acaba elantach bana inanır mıydı?"
